plot outline: A compelling story of a family, friends, foes and police in Indian drug industry. While one partner wants to get out, the others want a bigger slice of pie. In the chaos that ensues, its difficult to make out a friend from a foe. Can Aarya rise to the occasion?
title: Aarya
plot: When her world suddenly turns upside down, will _Aarya_ (qv) become the very thing she hated?How far will she go to survive and protect her family?

A compelling story of a family, friends, foes and police in Indian drug industry. While one partner wants to get out, the others want a bigger slice of pie. In the chaos that ensues, its difficult to make out a friend from a foe. Can _Aarya_ (qv) rise to the occasion?::aparsinghbataan

Tej Sareen lives with his wife _Aarya_ (qv) and three kids Veer,Arundati and Aditya he runs a pharmaceutical company with friend Jawahar and Arrya's brother Sangram.The companies business is not fully legal Sangram and Jawahar come with an idea of transporting heroin but Tej is against it they are attacked by some goons where Tej finds that they have looted heroin of a powerful person Shekhawat.During wedding of _Aarya_ (qv)'s sister Sangram is arrested for possessing heroin and tiff arises between Tej and Jawahar as he believes Tej leaked the information.Next day Tej tells _Aarya_ (qv) he will give better life to his family by shifting to New Zeland but next moment he is shot outside his house in front of Aditya.Tej survives the attack but later passes in hospital leaving the whole family distressed._Aarya_ (qv) finds that Inspector Khan is looking for a pen drive which has details of whole business of Tej she is blackmailed by a unknown kidnapper while Jawahar is attacked by Shekhawat's men.Arrya manages find access the details from password protected pen drive and will go to any extent to save her family.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
